==== Notes ====

-----

''A1 Both keyboards work simultaneously'' 

''A2 No Multimedia Keys''

''A3 No designated key''

''A4 No PS/2 port''

''A5 No middle click/Gestures not enabled in this version''

''A6 No Trackpad''

''A7 No unsecure wireless network. Test continued after manual connection/May apply to older Network Manager''

''A8 No .spx file in example file. Continued test with an mp3 file.''

''A9 No USB Card reader/Web cam/Microphone/Headphones''

''B1 A Nautilus window does not open until you double click the pendrive icon.''

''B2  No Firewire''

''B3 Sane not installed. Failed after installation for Brother MFC-440CN. Drivers must be manually installed and configured. "Simple Scan", which was installed, detected the scanner but could not use it either.''
